item.description:
This 2-hour self-guided walk (not including stops) begins at Kennedy Plaza in the center of Providence, and ends on College Hill at Prospect Terrace, with a five view of the city. We will stop for lunch along the way and enjoy the sites as well go.  Bring your camera!

 

Our stops will include:

1. Kennedy Plaza

2. City Hall

3. The Arcade

4. Round Top Church

5. First Baptist Meetinghouse

6. "Fleur de Lys" House

7. RISD Museum

8. Bayard Ewing Building

9. University

10. John Brown House

11. Museum of Rhode Island History 

12. Prospect Terrace

For greater detail about the stops click here.

Will wait 10 minutes for all to arrive. If your running late please call 508-4150-5090.
item.how_to_find_us: Kennedy Plaza - will update exactly where
item.name: Providence Walking Tour
